attributes.action: Keep the Blanche Heriot Unit  at St Peters Hospital,Chertsey open
attributes.additional_details: Stand up for BHU. Find out more about what they do here: http://www.blancheheriot.org.uk/
attributes.background: Blanche Heriot Unit at St Peter’s Hospital serves NW Surrey. Surrey County Council are backing a new contract to close the unit leaving north Surrey with no service:no inpatient nor outpatient service for HIV patients,no STI service, no sexual dysfunction service despite 15,000 attendances in 2016

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision seems to be the responsibility of Surrey County Council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://petitions.surreycc.gov.uk/
